sect1.title: General
sect1.para: ORU_SafetyGuard_QM shall include the handling of NvM, DCM, DEM, ScmPi related to ORU Safety Guard functionality and shall communicate with the ASIL component. 3rd party library and integration code included in the package. Scheduler shall call the init and cyclic functions of the integration code (ORU_SafetyGuard_QM) which shall call the library's functions. ORU_SafetyGuard_QM is rated QM.
